lines.text: Oh Sam, honey, you're going to be sitting at the red table today.
Oh Sam, that's not your table, sweety.
Um Sam, that's not your table either, sweety.
Come here, Sam. I'll show you to your correct seat.
Alright, kids, now that you're all in your seats, I want you to color in the sheets in front of you by following the colors that go with the numbers.
If you're done coloring, make sure your name is on your paper and place it on the board.
